jodd.madvoc.scope

Interface MadvocScope

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BodyScope, CookieScope, HeaderScope, JsonBodyScope, MadvocContextScope, ParamsScope, RequestScope, ServletContextScope, SessionScope

    public interface MadvocScope
    Madvoc scope implementation. In a nutshell, a scope is an object that knows how to perform injection and outjection of some scope context into and from a Target.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void inject(ActionRequest actionRequest, Targets targets)
      Injects action request context into the targets.
      void inject(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext, Targets targets)
      Injects servlet context into the targets.
      void inject(Targets targets)
      Injects general context into the targets.
      void outject(ActionRequest actionRequest, Targets targets)
      Outjects targets into action request context.
